conversations.body_text: Hi Nahum Cruz De Dios,    Yes, we will ship from our U.S. warehouse. Please don't worry.

That's great, thank you very much! I appreciate it

On Mon, Nov 10, 2025 at 12:52 AM service@simsonn.com
